testcase.name: Login to User Page
testcase.system-out: Given user opens the browser and website window.............................passed When user clicks on signin button...........................................passed Then user enters username and password and logs in..........................passed Then login page is opened...................................................passed Then user clicks on my wishlists............................................passed Then user searches for items................................................passed Then user clicks on add to cart and checks out to open summary page.........passed Then user checks out to open address page and adds new address..............passed Then user enters user credentials and save..................................passed Then user proceeds to check out and opens shipping page.....................passed Then user checks out to payment and pays by wire............................passed Then user confirms order....................................................passed And browser is closed.......................................................passed
